questions.q: There are four different student teams that work in the Memorial Union and Student Pavilion. One of these student areas are the Building Managers. Name the other three student teams.
questions.a: Event Assistants (EAs), Information Desk Staff, and Operations Aides.

questions.q: What is the required dress code for each student team?
questions.a: Each team follows the department’s professional dress standards, including designated uniforms or attire suitable for events and guest-facing operations.

questions.q: What is the formal name of the department that you work for?
questions.a: Memorial Union and Student Pavilion Operations.
